name: 3D Entity Panel
description: VR/AR panel for adding 3D entities, models, images, and primitives to the spatial scene. Search Poly Haven for free CC0 models or upload your own GLTF/GLB/OBJ files.
author: StickerNest

setTab.description: Set active tab: search, upload, images, primitives

searchQuery.description: Set search query for Poly Haven models

addModel.description: Add a 3D model to the scene { url, name }

entity:added.description: Emitted when an entity is added to the scene { type, id, name, ... }

model:selected.description: Emitted when a model is selected for preview
